description: This source file defines a Flutter widget called ControlBar, which provides Undo and Restart buttons for a 2048 game. It interacts with the GameProvider to perform actions and determine the state for enabling/disabling buttons.

classes.name: ControlBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a control bar with Undo and Restart buttons, wired to the GameProvider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the control bar, including buttons that invoke game actions.

methods.name: _canUndo
methods.description: Helper method to determine if the Undo button should be enabled based on the game's current score.
